(OOC: Oh.. phooey. Thanks anyway! LOL Is that per character?)

Teltoli grins as her missile hits, and tries to jump to the side as 
the bullets come her way, but three of them graze her side and one 
impacted in her left arm. She grunted and fired another missile, and 
two of her poison darts.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: Unitron, Your bots are at the CF now, right? If not the 
maximal part of 
> this post is void. Teltoli, 2 missles are the minimum.  Just so you 
know and 
> wont fire three again.
> 
> :::Orion/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky 
Lynx/Jetstorm/Sharpedge/Godfather/Gigatron:::
> 
> ::Orion fires 2 missles at Dark One.  Ratchet fires 8 shots from 
each of his 
> 2 blasters at Sixshot.  Sideswipe fires 25 shots at Injector and 2 
missles at 
> Bumblebee. Sky Lynx fires 2 missles from each of his missle 
launcher at 
> Manterror.  Sharpedge and Jetstorm get hit by Caitiff's attacks, 
but they 
> dodge the EMP stuff.  Sharpedge gets hit by Hot Rods optic blasts, 
but 
> Jetstorm only gets hit by one charge.  Hellbat gets hit by the 
EMPs.  Hellbat 
> fires 2 missles at the autoguns.  Sharpedge fires 1 missle at Hot 
Rod and 1 
> at Caitiff.  Jetstorm fires 12 energy blasts at Caitiff, 13 energy 
blasts at 
> Hot Rod and 25 rapid fire optic blasts at the autoguns.  Godfather 
gets hit 
> by 1 of the missles and dodges the poison dart.  he fires 8 more 
shots from 
> his pistol at Teltoli::
> Godfather: Whack for my daddy-o!
> 
----------------------------------------------------------------------
--------
> 
> ---------------------------------------------
> ::Gigatron cannot stop himself from crying from the amazing things 
before 
> him.  He looks to the others::
> Gigatron: w-what d-do we do now?
